text: أَوَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُمۡ ءَايَةً أَن يَعۡلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَـٰٓؤُاْ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ

translation.en: And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel
translation.id: Apakah tidak (cukup) menjadi bukti bagi mereka, bahwa para ulama Bani Israil mengetahuinya
